ModMetaData.name: Simple Trans (Expanded)
ModMetaData.description:
Simple Trans (Expanded) is a 1.6-only major expansion of the original Simple Trans Continued mod, providing a comprehensive gender identity and reproductive capability system for RimWorld.
**Core Features:** • Separates gender identity from reproductive biology using hediff system • Individual reproductive capabilities (carrying/siring) independent of gender • Comprehensive medical transition systems with informed consent dialogs • Organ transplantation between pawns with genetic inheritance • Basic and bionic prosthetic systems with contraception control • Capability-specific sterilization and fertility surgeries
**Ideology DLC Features:** • Gender Affirmation Party ritual for name and gender changes • Biosculpter Gender Affirming cycle for body type and reproductive modifications
**Enhanced Compatibility:** • Full Biotech integration with pregnancy system overrides • Intimacy mod compatibility with attraction system patches • Non-Binary Gender mod support with specialized attraction handling • Vanilla Expanded Framework gene system integration
This expansion adds extensive medical systems, safety features, and enhanced mod compatibility while maintaining the original philosophy of providing meaningful transgender representation in RimWorld through detailed, respectful gameplay mechanics.
